Percaptor:

"Let explain you Maxima..."say the male and a voice recorder started 
to work appeared what Megatron had said"I am as authentic as the 
idiots who took the name 'Megatron' as their own and they were 
defeated.  My spark is a creation of Vector Sigma, a near complete 
copy of the original Megatron, up until the year 2005, when Unicron 
created Galvatron.  But my memory goes back farther, before the 
Quintessons made Megaton the Tyrant that tried to destroy the 
Autobots.  I am here in search of family, but if any of you stand in 
my way-....."After that Percepto said "The should mean, you , so 
called Meagatron that you're a clone... a copy of Our leader... and 
tha mean, Maxima... that he isn't the true MEgatro, Acopy could 
be... the true one, no... 'cause the TRUE MEGATRON it's still 
alive... and ya know who is, Maxima"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> The clone decended.  This femme was bold, taking a chance that he 
wouldn't scrap her on a whim.  She definatly was a Predacon.  But 
she was wrong about him.  About his character and his purpose here.  
His face was younger, not the middle aged face of Megatron the 
Tyrant, but the youthful face of Megatron before he was driven mad.
> "I believe you have mistaken me for someone else," Megatron 
Revived said as he decended to speak with this creature.  She was 
beautiful.  If he wasn't looking for family right now, he would 
seriously concider trying to get to know this femme.
> "I am not the same Megatron that tried to defeat Optimus Prime.  I 
would explain my origins, but it would be futile, for everyone 
believes the biased Autobot and later Maximal Councils.  So, make it 
brief.  I have little patience or time to deal with idle chit chat."
> 
> MaximaSR74@a... wrote:
> Endulging in that kiss... the part of her that had finally gotten 
use to the new form & ideal way of the Transformers... enjoyed this 
affection now. No longer resenting the small organic part of her. 
> 
> As the kiss was broken, she grinned & nodded. "As you wish," she 
purred. 
> 
> Then gracefully glided out of the chamber... heading towards the 
entrance where the Megatron clone was.
> 
> Shaking her head as she barely caught sight of Waspinator flying 
out & taking on the brunt of Megatron's cannon blast.... 
> 
> Striding out through the doors with great confidence, glancing 
briefly at Perceptor as she passed by him. Then returned her crimson 
optics to gaze upon the haunting fiure of Megatron. Her core 
twisted... feeling as though her loyalties were going to be tested 
terribly. Ever so loyal to Megatron... but if there were 2 of them, 
how could she be loyal to both? 
> 
> Remaining bold & confident, she spoke in a likewise voice, "Rather 
bold of you to return to us after all this time!" 
> 
> That fembot, feline form... slender, attractive for one of her 
stature... white with black stripes in some places... a mix of metal 
& organic... a pair of wings from her back... making her appear 
likened to an angel. 
> 
> She awaited Megatron's response. 
>
